医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
斯洛伐克 Comenius 大学的 3DHISTECH斯洛伐克卫生部与斯洛伐克病理学家协会合作，在布拉迪斯拉发夸美纽斯大学组织了数字病理学解决方案演示日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/3DHISTECH-at-the-Comenius-University-in-Slovakia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/3DHISTECH-at-the-Comenius-University-in-Slovakia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fc8bbbc-3af6-419a-b19a-edc2a59cb8c1 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:06:00 -0400 3DHISTECH at the Comenius University in Slovakia
3DHISTECH 和 Epredia 开设病理学创新孵化器，加速癌症诊断的进步匈牙利 3DHISTECH 和 PHC 集团成员（总部位于日本）Epredia 两家领先的病理学和诊断公司宣布在布达佩斯开设病理学创新孵化器，以开发更快、更精确地诊断癌症和肿瘤病变的方法和设备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/3DHISTECH-and-Epredia-open-pathology-innovation-incubator-to-accelerate-advancements-in-cancer-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/3DHISTECH-and-Epredia-open-pathology-innovation-incubator-to-accelerate-advancements-in-cancer-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a6b6640-ee94-476f-aafd-7b092a85f8e1 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:05:00 -0400 3DHISTECH and Epredia open pathology innovation incubator to accelerate advancements in cancer diagnostics
AI-Doctor视网膜疾病检测准确率重新定义医疗诊断先进的人工智能 (AI) 系统，旨在精确解读眼底荧光素血管造影 (FFA) 图像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/AI-Doctors-accuracy-in-retinal-disease-detection-redefines-medical-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/AI-Doctors-accuracy-in-retinal-disease-detection-redefines-medical-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2ef0a50-bdd3-449f-9a4a-7e9b6acf0ac2 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 05:56:00 -0400 AI-Doctor's accuracy in retinal disease detection redefines medical diagnosis
长期食用超加工食品可能会增加患抑郁症的风险超加工食品（UPF）对心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Long-term-conspiration-of-ultra-processed-foods-may-increase-depression-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Long-term-conspiration-of-ultra-processed-foods-may-increase-depression-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0600d8f8-3849-4fd7-ac80-cab25b433e08 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Long-term consumption of ultra-processed foods may increase depression risk
BMI 是评估死亡风险的最佳肥胖指标吗？研究人员评估了肥胖标志物，以确定与死亡率相关性最一致的标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Is-BMI-the-optimal-adiposity-marker-to-assess-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Is-BMI-the-optimal-adiposity-marker-to-assess-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43197b3e-9849-4297-b21b-8cab6a9e49bc Mon, 25 Sep 2023 03:59:00 -0400 Is BMI the optimal adiposity marker to assess mortality risk?
替泽帕肽在降低 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖和体重方面优于其他治疗方法荟萃分析发现，替西帕肽是控制 2 型糖尿病患者血糖和体重最有效的 GLP-1 受体激动剂。该研究表明，替西帕肽在疾病的初始阶段可能更佳，而其他 GLP-1 受体激动剂与胰岛素联合治疗对于长期糖尿病患者同样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Tirzepatide-outshines-other-treatments-in-lowering-blood-sugar-and-weight-for-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Tirzepatide-outshines-other-treatments-in-lowering-blood-sugar-and-weight-for-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=544569f1-9ab5-462f-9241-47126ffb6873 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 01:16:00 -0400 Tirzepatide outshines other treatments in lowering blood sugar and weight for type 2 diabetes patients
COVID-19 促使纽约州北部民众拥抱后院农业康奈尔大学的一项研究表明，在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行期间，纽约州北部居民转向后院和野生食品生产，以更好地控制食品供应。该研究强调了与大流行相关的传统食品供应链中断如何导致园艺、家禽饲养和觅食大幅增加，以此作为改善粮食安全的战略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/COVID-19-pushed-upstate-New-Yorkers-to-embrace-backyard-farming.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/COVID-19-pushed-upstate-New-Yorkers-to-embrace-backyard-farming.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fead118d-d435-417d-aae0-441ae5d4707a Mon, 25 Sep 2023 01:02:00 -0400 COVID-19 pushed upstate New Yorkers to embrace backyard farming
SARS-CoV-2 变种如何智胜我们的免疫系统和疫苗？研究人员利用多组学分析来了解 SARS-CoV-2 变体（包括 Alpha、Delta 和 Omicron）如何调节宿主的细胞反应并适应逃避人类免疫。该研究强调了针对适应性和先天免疫反应的靶向治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/How-are-SARS-CoV-2-variants-outsmarting-our-immune-system-and-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/How-are-SARS-CoV-2-variants-outsmarting-our-immune-system-and-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=513754db-64a7-4b83-a7eb-1c44deb50fbd Mon, 25 Sep 2023 00:39:00 -0400 How are SARS-CoV-2 variants outsmarting our immune system and vaccines?
幼儿园制定的膳食计划能让孩子变得更健康吗？根据《营养》杂志上的一项研究，幼儿园精心制定的膳食计划可显着增加儿童对蔬菜、全谷物和坚果的摄入量。该研究强调了早期教育环境中结构化营养对于长期健康益处的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Can-crafted-meal-plans-in-kindergarten-lead-to-healthier-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Can-crafted-meal-plans-in-kindergarten-lead-to-healthier-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=add52c48-67e7-41d5-9fff-f6a4b093ec66 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 00:23:00 -0400 Can crafted meal plans in kindergarten lead to healthier kids?
CaMKK2 酶能否成为治疗双相情感障碍的关键？研究人员探索了 CaMKK2 信号通路在双相情感障碍中的作用，建议将其作为新的治疗靶点。通过针对这种酶，科学家们的目标是开发针对双相情感障碍症状和代谢功能障碍的更有效的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Could-CaMKK2-enzyme-be-the-key-to-treating-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Could-CaMKK2-enzyme-be-the-key-to-treating-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba11d99c-6dea-4606-971a-e9528391ce31 Sun, 24 Sep 2023 23:41:00 -0400 Could CaMKK2 enzyme be the key to treating bipolar disorder?
